title: How to get block data before re-genesis?

labels.name: C-question
labels.description: User questions that are neither feature requests nor bug reports

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

I want to get block data before regenesis. 
Based on the document below there are time gap between current block history from the pre-genesis( before jun 4th 2021) till the current change start ( around Nov 11th, 2021). 

https://community.optimism.io/docs/useful-tools/explorers/#pre-23-june-2021-history

More than  5 months has gap. 

Please let me know how to get `RAW` block data before regenesis. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**System Specs:**
 - OS:
 - Package Version (or commit hash):

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
